attributes.action: Homeless jewish famllies/Help Children from Imporeverishe famllies.d
attributes.additional_details:
It is the 'International communitys' unreasonable pressure and demands on Israel that forces them feed their enemy instead of their own people.
As you might have notice, the Arabs/Muslim countries can commit any atrocities and there is not a word of critics. Israel they are forcing to feed their enemy, otherwise they are condemned.
It is called anti-Semitism and flourishes openly among Arabs/Muslims. But the West are just as hatefull towards Israel and the Jews. They are the ones financing the Arabs to erase Israel.
